pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Chancellor Angela Merkel | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany.

The leaders discussed opportunities for collaboration on priorities for the G7 Summit Canada will host in Charlevoix on June 8 and 9, 2018. They discussed the importance of G7 nations working together as advanced economies to support economic growth that benefits everyone.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Chancellor Merkel discussed how the G7 can show leadership and make meaningful investments in education for girls and women, especially in fragile and crisis settings. They also discussed how the G7 can work together to make progress on climate change and take bold action to protect our oceans. 

The Prime Minister and the Chancellor also discussed the need to foster open trade, while addressing protectionism and barriers to trade.  

The leaders agreed to keep in contact as the G7 Leadersâ€™ Summit in Charlevoix draws closer.
